TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: You Look Fine!
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Stops pawns from changing their look at the style bench every five goddamn minutes, it's a story simulator not Barbies Makeup Challenge.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Darklight Glow Pods
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Makes glow pods spawned in insectoid nests use the darklight colour.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Disable Desired Apparel
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Disables default Ideology desired apparel from showing up, that random shit that factions use throughout them for no fucking reason.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: No Meme Limit
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Raises the limit of how many memes you can choose to 1000...so effectively no limit.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Proper Suppression
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Changes suppression mechanics slightly so that rebellions never happen if your slaves are kept suppressed. Also prevents suppressed pawns from taking part in rebellions when they do happen.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Suppression Threshold
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Controls the percentage at which rebellions are considered suppressed, if Proper Suppression is enabled this is the threshold at which rebellions would be disabled entirely.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Unlocked Ideology Buildings
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Removes the meme restriction on ideology buildings so you can use them regardless of what memes you have. Includes floors and apparel.

TweaksGalore.TweakSubSectionDef.label: Ancient Deconstruction
TweaksGalore.TweakSubSectionDef.description: Makes the Ancient Ruins added by Ideology and Biotech deconstructable instead of having to destroy them.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Enabled
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Makes the Ancient Ruins added by Ideology and Biotech deconstructable instead of having to destroy them.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Give Proper Materials
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Changes returned items to some reasonable materials instead of just slag.
